meanings.definition: A person or group at the forefront of new ideas or movements.
meanings.sent1: The vanguardist led the team in exploring innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The vanguardist in the art community always introduced fresh perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The vanguardist's quirky hat collection sparked laughter among friends.
meanings.sent4: Her bold fashion choices made her the vanguardist of the group.
meanings.sent5: As a vanguardist, he inspired others to think outside the box.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the vanguard or a vanguardist.
meanings.sent1: The vanguardist approach to design revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: Her vanguardist ideas challenged traditional norms.
meanings.sent3: The vanguardist color palette added a modern twist to the room.
meanings.sent4: His vanguardist mindset paved the way for future innovations.
meanings.sent5: The vanguardist style of architecture stood out among the rest.
